name: Math Time (SteekStook)
description:
Math as quick as you can before the timer runs out!

Math Time is a math game where an equation is presented along with 3 options, and you will have to pick the right answer under the time limit. It's a simple and fast bout with math! If you want a harder challenge, you can compete against others in the leaderboard for the top spot. 

This game is also available on Liluo.io!:  https://liluo.io/steekstook/mathtime

Note: The Liluo.io build on mobile is bugged. If you want to play the game on mobile you can download the apk file.
